name: The Block Pro
title: Trump And Melania Memecoins Impact Onchain
text:
Synopsis
The launch of TRUMP and MELANIA memecoins, endorsed by Donald Trump, represents a notable crypto market phenomenon that intersects political branding with cryptocurrency speculation, potentially signaling emerging trends in digital asset tokenization.

Key Insights
- TRUMP memecoin was launched on January 17, 2025, and quickly endorsed by Trump via Truth Social and X platforms
- Initial liquidity pool was deployed at approximately 10:15 pm Eastern Time on launch day
- The token's fully diluted valuation (FDV) was slightly above $700,000 at launch
- The newsletter suggests a favorable regulatory environment for digital assets under the anticipated Trump administration
- Bitcoin is projected to approach the $100,000 milestone
- December 2024 saw a significant 267.1% month-over-month increase in NFT trading volumes
- Ethereum underwent a significant upgrade (Dencun) in March 2024, implementing proto-danksharding (EIP-4844) with a separate fee market for "blobspace"
